SENT.plain: A four-year-old boy had a cecoanal intussusception prolapsing through the anus
A 4 x 4 cm cecal tumor served as the leading point of the intussusception
Laparotomy and histology revealed that the tumor was a solitary Burkitt's lymphoma of the cecum
Isolated Burkitt's lymphoma, as presented here, is rare, and such a combination has never been reported
Intussusception prolapsing through the anus and Burkitt's lymphoma are discussed, as well as a possible reason for the rarity of the condition
